channel.title: Posts on Johandry's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Johandry's Blog

item.title: First Post
item.description: Is it? Nah! I think this is my 3rd attempt to start a blog. I started with johandry.blogspot.com then I started a cool project with PerlDancer and created this other blog perlondancer.blogspot.com. Also, there were a couple of failed attempts with WordPress.com. I’ll continue posting, I have some ideas and projects that I have in my Github. Most of them related to Go and DevOps. Stay tuned!
